resources.string: "According to Google Policy, our app can access your call log only if it's set as default phone app. Until then we will show list of checked calls only. If you want to see your call log please switch the protection to Active."

Thanks to anonymous account you will be able to backup and restore your app data (all your reviews, blocked and allowed numbers) and settings on any device without connection to your email or phone number.
Instead of use of email or phone number we will generate unique anonymous User ID which can be optionally protected by password.

"We really want to keep your account anonymous. That's why it is not connected either with your e-mail or your phone number. We will generate a unique user ID instead. Don't forget to store it afterwards, you must paste it back manually after log out or for new sign in - either in your old or in new mobile phone."
"Don't forget to store it afterwards, you must paste it back manually after log out or for new sign in - either in your old or in new mobile phone."

With active protection you will be able to use all features of our app. System will automatically call our app to check incoming calls, so the app will not need to use any workarounds which consume more system resources and should fail sometimes.
Should I Answer needs some system permissions to start protecting you against unwanted calls!
Join our Facebook community to be in closer contact with us.
Help us to make the world a better place!
We are here to protect you!
Suggest our app to your friends, share our link on social networks, forums, or blogs… Help the community grow - more people means more information.
Recommend the app to your friends
If you think we deserve it, do it! Google Play reviews will help new users decide to join our community!
"If you find some new information about any unsolicited call don't keep it for yourself. Share it with our community!"
High Protection - higher possibility of false positive
Lower Protection - minimal possibility of false positive
Standard Protection - low possibility of false positive
If you already have a group of contacts in your Contacts, you can block it. Tap on the Pick Group and select the group or groups from the list.
If you want to block any of your Contacts, tap on the Pick Contact and select the contact or contacts from the list.

This function will block an incoming call with a pick up and hang up action. The application will not pick up a call if the phone is in roaming mode. Please use this feature only if you are sure you will not be charged for picking up the incoming calls.
Remove blocked calls from call log
This feature does not work on all devices. Disable it if you find any issue with this function.
Displays call and number information after finished call for unfamiliar phone numbers
Show alert for numbers rated as unknown
If our application blocks some call, you will be always notified
By continuing you agree with the Terms of use and Privacy Policy.
"Should I Answer Error - Can't show alert on screen!"
Reviews download failed! Please check your internet connection!
Service is temporarily unavailable! Try again later!
"Can't block due to low count of negative ratings. To block the number, add negative rating or change database sensitivity."
No threat detected with this number so far. It could be safe or just undiscovered trouble. Be careful!
Allow system permissions to read call information
"You haven't added anyone to your whitelist yet. Want to change it? Just tap on icon below and add a number."

These numbers will be never blocked. They can call you - even if other users reported them as spam or if they fall into mask or group you block. You can add new number by tapping on the icon below - write the number at best in full international format, without spaces and other letters (only allowed are +, digits and * for group rule).
If you already have a group of contacts in your Contacts, you can block it. Tap on the Pick Group and select the group or groups from the list.
If you want to block any of your Contacts, tap on the Pick Contact and select the contact or contacts from the list.
The app blocks numbers reported by the users as nuisance or spam. The precision can be adjusted by correcting the community database sensitivity.
Block INCOMING call when number is
Block OUTGOING call when number is
"There's nobody in your personal blacklist yet. You have the patience of a saint, don't you?"

These numbers will be always blocked. They will not be able to call you - even if other users reported them as safe. You can add new number by tapping on the icon below - write the number at best in full international format, without spaces and other letters (only allowed are +, digits and * for group rule).
"You have enabled some numbers for blocking but you don't have set the Active Protection. Please open the Protection Settings and choose Active Protection for blocking."
Right now, all app features are available for free. If you think we deserve your support, you can subscribe to any tier.
"Can't start screen for overlays management. Please do it manually!"
Notification that our app is running in the background
"Various important notifications when something needs the user's attention"
Notification for managing the pending calls
Notification for managing important pending calls
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
The app needs an access to your contacts. Without this permission it’s not able to distinguish which number is unknown to you.
"The app's database hasn't been updated for more than 4 days. Please connect to the internet and update the database."
Technical device information and app logs will be sent to our server, helping the developers with solving your issue. No personal data is sent, phone numbers in logs are anonymized.
Please safely store your login information to be able to use your account on new device.
Please check if you have stored login information to be able to sign in later.
We generated safe user id to avoid using your personal data for signin. You will be able to store it after account creation.
Do you really want to delete this report?
"The app hasn't blocked anyone yet. (You can check your blocking preferences in Settings.)"
Enter Contact name or Phone number
Failed to send ticket. Check internet connection and try again!

Features like Reading of call logs, integration of alerts in Call Screen and automatic blocking will NOT be available. On some devices, the system can terminate our monitoring of incoming call, so we will not be able to even alert you.
For purposes of improving this service, you agree with anonymous sharing of information about incoming calls from phone numbers not stored in your Contacts.

"Use if some Contacts are not visible. This option will enable our app to read and display also Contacts stored as invisible. If this doesn't help, please check the system of Contacts storage in your phone - all Contacts should be stored in the same location, in your Gmail account by default."

"If you use the 'Custom call screen' alerts, our window is displayed as a full-screen, or a small notification screen in case some other app is in the foreground. To force the system to open our app in a full screen view nevertheless there is some other app opened, and make our window always visible, use this item."
Use for two-SIM phones to show SIM card selection before the call. In default we use your phone system settings, check that first.

"Disallow call: call is silently canceled on your side, but it seems on the caller's side that the phone is still ringing
Reject call: call will be disconnected as if the user had manually rejected it. The calling party will hear busy signal
Pick & hang: call will be accepted, but the app will hang up in the same second"
How to set default phone app
"Find the 'Default apps' in system settings and change 'Phone app' to 'Should I Answer'. Then tap the Back button until you return back to our application."
How would you classify this number?
Our information about incoming call will be displayed in front of the system Call Screen.
Our information about incoming call will be displayed in system notification area.
A fast ImageView (and Drawable) that supports rounded corners (and ovals or circles) based on the original example from Romain Guy.
Our app can automatically protect you against unwanted calls. Currently, there is no protection level turned on.
"Alert can't be displayed! Allow draw over other apps!"
If you are satisfied with our service, please help our community!

"Share your experience for this number and report it either as safe or as spam. Your report will help other users. Your reviews are sent to us and will be displayed publicly on our page for the respective number, and also in reports displayed in the app. Please write the reports always in accordance with the rules of this service and privacy policy. You can adjust or delete your report anytime.
If you just block the number, it will not be able to call you, but this will not influence other users."
Number is not stored in your Contacts. If this is PUBLIC phone number, please share your experience with other users.
Number is stored in your Contacts but is reported as SPAM by community.
"Number is stored in your Contacts so it's considered as SAFE and PRIVATE by default! If this is a PUBLIC phone number, please share your experience with other users."

"Did you find our app useful?
Please consider supporting the app development."
"We've noticed you've been using and old version of the app. Please install the new one and then uninstall this older version."
On average, our database grows by 30,000 numbers every day.
Oops! We have nothing to show yet!
Please choose level of protection and type of alerts. Then, follow instructions described in Required actions
Please describe your issue precisely. Step by step, what happened and what were your actions. Thank you!
Popup in front of system Call Screen
Protection against unwanted calls, trusted by millions of users.
"Actual protection can't work correctly due issue with System Permissions. Please open Protection Settings and fix the issue."
"You haven't reported any number yet. Don't know how? Tap on some unknown number and report it as Safe or Spam."

Numbers you have reported as safe or spam. Your reviews are sent to us and will be displayed publicly on our page for the respective number, and also in reports displayed in the app. Please write the reports always in accordance with the rules of this service and privacy policy. You can adjust or delete your report anytime, just be aware that any change will be visible also for other users.
Set application as default phone app
If not sure about the type, we recommend to choose the Active protection. The type can be changed anytime.
System permissions are required to display call log
System permissions are required to display your Contacts
This number is in your Contacts
There is no community review yet
Thank you for your feedback! We will use it for further improvements.
"Finished! Now you can block spam calls or allow the app to block them for you. Please check the blocking options in app's Settings."
"That's it! Whenever a spam call comes, the app will warn you against it. For enabling blocking options go to the app's Settings."
The app can directly block spam calls
"The app can't protect you at all :-("
The app can only display warnings against spam
The app works on an anonymous basis. We never download and share your private data with anyone.
There is one last thing the app needs to activate your protection
This feature can be used with \"Custom call screen\" only. You can set it in the Protection Settings.
This feature is not available on Android 6 devices
We will not monitor incoming calls at all. You can use the app for manual checking of phone numbers.

"Without some permissions our app can't work properly. We are using Contacts for displaying information about incoming call and minimizing number of unnecessary alerts. All numbers stored in your Contacts are handled as safe by default. We keep your Contacts private, we don't use them for any other purposes. Also please don't report private numbers."
(you can change it in Settings any time)
You can enter multiple numbers separated by comma. You can also use mask like +123*, or +420*.
You have not finished report for this number. Continue reporting?
You have reported this number as:

You will be able to set automatic blocking of unwanted calls. All incoming calls will be checked and you will be always alerted. System will automatically call our app to check incoming calls, so the app will not need to use any workarounds which consumes more system resources and should fail sometimes.
Your knowledge of this phone number will help to inform and protect other users. Choose Rating, select Category and enter your Comment - at least a few words if applicable, that will help. Thank you!
Your system call screen will be replaced by our version with integrated information about incoming call.
